item.title: ECOM6008 Procurement and Outsourcing Strategies
item.description: Oursourcing Benefits and Risks Overview what went wrong need fine-tuning need more more effective IT due to technologies change rapidly short life-cycle products uncertainty in customer demand is enormous main issues buy/make decision process identify the advantages/risks associated with outsourcing present a framework for optimizing buy/make decisions procurement process independent, private, & consortium-based e-marketplaces opportunities & challenges Outsourcing
